header.both_description: The web page will be designed with reference to both the style layout and information content of the images.
header.image_content_description: Referring to the information content and functional requirements of the picture, the result is more inclined to the logic described in the picture.
header.image_style_description: Refer to the style layout of the picture, such as background color, font, etc., and the result will be more inclined to the style of the picture.
header.title: AI Web Page Generator 2.0
header.url_input_placeholder: Create a calculator using the Apple style.
